amendment.description: To maintain the State Homeland Security Grant Program at the fiscal year 2004 funding level.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3625 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3625 proposed by Senator Nelson NE. (consideration: CR S9110) To maintain the State Homeland Security Grant Program at the fiscal year 2004 funding level.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3625 proposed by Senator Nelson NE.
